Funnelcloud | Toronto | Competitive Compensation, Smart Team

Small but profitable and growing startup is building event oriented systems for manufacturing system analysis and control (formally called an MES - Manufacturing Execution Systems.) We use scala/akka, elixir, kafka, and timeseries tooling. It's an IoT type of problem space.

Looking for fulltime engineers in Toronto with scala, elixir, clojure or any FP background preferably, but Rubyists with interest in learning elixir and functional programming may fit as well.

Mail jason at funnelcloud.io
